p: Crude methanolic extract of Spondias mombin (bark and leaves) was found to exhibit anticandidal effects with diameters of 11.00 ± 0.47 mm and 15.00 ± 0.47 mm, respectively. The extracts have varying degrees of phytochemical compositions such as terpenoids, alkaloids, glycosides, saponin, and flavonoids [ 89]. Psidium guajava extracts were active on Candida albicans isolates from caries infected patients [ 90]. Additionally, Alchornea laxiflora leaf extracts have antibacterial and antifungal activities due to flavonoids, alkaloids, saponins, tannins, and reducing sugars as major phytochemicals [ 36].
